name: ClassicsForKids
0:
”Alexa, open classics for kids”
”Alexa, pause”
”Alexa, resume”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: classics for kids
des:
Introduce children to classical music in a fun and entertaining way.

Once you've enabled the skill, you can say "Alexa, open classics for kids“ to start listening.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
